name: You Won't Survive
description:
this  is a game where you should survive a single zombie the art is also not good

i am also a new game developer so  some would say the game is "cringe" or "very bad"

but i know i put effort on it and that matters also report any bug i will surely fix it 

and i am going to update this game if it goes popular(Which it will not) so stay tuned 

bye!.
